description.narrative: To enhance capacity, performance and accountability of MDAs in the use of public resources and service delivery to levels consistent with timely and effective i mplementation of the strategic and priority programs under the MKUKUTA. Enhanced performance will be evidenced by: (i) improvements in the policy-making and reg ulatory capacity of MDAs that will contribute to a more predictable and well reg ulated environment for service delivery institutions and for private sector deve lopment; (ii) improved use of performance management systems by MDAs and their l inkages to service delivery; (iii) improved management of public servants; and ( iv) greater access to information and responsiveness to the demands of stakehold ers that contributes to greater transparency and accountability of government an d improved governance.
